title: Deployment of subDAO Safes on Polygon - Motion
body:
It is hereby motioned to create two instances of a Gnosis Safe on the Polygon network for the Asset Management and Funding subDAO entities in order to engage in opportunities and strategies present on this network.

The signer structure of the multi-sig on Polygon will be inherited from Ethereum mainnet, and the Cat Herder will be responsible to coordinate the deployment of the Safe with the lead signer of the respective subDAO.

**Should the subDAOs deploy the two Gnosis Safes on the Polygon network as outlined above?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
